name: Buddhist Temple of Dallas (Thai Market)
phone: (214) 340-1000 (This is the general temple number, food service hours may vary)
description: This Thai Buddhist temple hosts a vibrant street food market every Sunday from approximately 10 AM to 2 PM. Visitors can enjoy a wide variety of authentic Thai dishes, prepared by volunteers. It's a unique cultural experience that includes food, crafts, and a glimpse into Thai Buddhism
services: Buddhist-owned Breakfast restaurants in Texas consultation
